volunteer_experience.info: In affiliation with an orphanage, "Mamta," adopted young girls and turned their artisanal crafts into a sustainable livelihoods. By providing raw materials to create crafts and selling them across exhibitions and events, "Wings" was aimed at providing flight to their imagination.

volunteer_experience.info: By providing access to bicycles to children in rural districts of Rajasthan, Pahiya was aimed to reducing the bridge that stands between students and education.

publications: [{"title":"A World on Hold : A Living Record of the Global Pandemic (ranked #4 in Amazon's best-seller list)","subtitle":"Om Books International","date":"July 1, 2022","description":"Through twenty diverse and compelling experiences of individuals living through an unprecedented global pandemic, A World on Hold chronicles a historic period which brought the whole world to a standstill. It documents the voices of not only the well-heeled and privileged – parliamentarian and author Shashi Tharoor, actor Vidya Balan, celebrity chef Shilarna Vaze and celebrated editor Nonita Kalra – but also those whose voices and stories were relegated to mere numbers: an anonymous police officer, a migrant worker, a gravedigger, a cabin crew member and even a Covid-19 human challenge volunteer, among others."},{"title":"The Trouble With Comparisons in Grief","subtitle":"The Wire","date":"April 28, 2021","description":"As the pandemic brought India and the world to a standstill, a collective sense of loss and disillusionment took over the world. Humanity underwent a historic shift. From healthcare, hospitality, and aviation to frontline work, politics and entertainment – 2020 upended life as we knew it. And, it introduced a particular kind of pain. This article explores the concept of, what I call, ‘pandemic grief’."},{"title":"It Was Always You","subtitle":"Rupa Publications","date":"February 19, 2016","description":"1. Key endorsement by Dr. Shashi Tharoor: “Divita is a 17-year-old girl with a rare gift to excel.”2. Gained recognition as the youngest author in India to be published by a nationally-renowned publisher, Rupa Publications3. Received endorsements by DNA (newspaper) and Producer, NH8"}]
